str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To uncover, bring to light, reveal. From apo and kalupto; to take off the cover, i.e. Disclose.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
